entry.title: FOG ADVISORY , Assiniboia
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:36 AM CST Sunday 15 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -7.9°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Assiniboia Airport 12:00 PM CST Sunday 15 January 2023
Temperature: -7.9°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.4 kPa rising
Humidity: 89 %
Wind Chill: -12
Dewpoint: -9.4°C
Wind: WNW 8 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of light snow. Temperature steady near minus 8. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of light snow and risk of freezing drizzle. Fog dissipating this afternoon. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light this afternoon. Temperature steady near minus 8. Wind chill near minus 15. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CST Sunday 15 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Cloudy. Temperature steady near minus 8.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Fog patches developing this evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature steady near minus 8. Wind chill near minus 13. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CST Sunday 15 January 2023
